# Feature Selection: SelectFromModel (Logistic Regression)

```{r}
library(daltoolbox)
library(daltoolboxdp)

lg    <- create_fe_lg_model(df, "Class", C = 1.0)
sf    <- create_fe_selectfrommodel_lg(lg, threshold = "mean", prefit = TRUE)
X_sel <- fit_transform_fe_selectfrommodel_lg(sf, df, "Class")

dim(X_sel)
```
